fr.zcraft.quartzlib.tools.items

Class GlowEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment
      • org.bukkit.enchantments.EnchantmentWrapper
        • fr.zcraft.quartzlib.tools.items.GlowEffect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.Keyed

    public class GlowEffect
extends org.bukkit.enchantments.EnchantmentWrapper
    A fake enchantment to add a glowing effect on any item. Only work with 1.12 and before.
    Author:
    Amaury Carrade

    • Method Detail

      • addGlow

        public static void addGlow(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Adds a glowing effect to the given item stack.

        Warning: this effect is a bit unstable: it will be thrown away if the item's meta is updated. So add it at the end.

        Parameters:
        item - The item.

      • removeGlow

        public static void removeGlow(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Removes a previously-added glowing effect from the given item.
        Parameters:
        item - The item.

      • hasGlow

        public static boolean hasGlow(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Returns if the give item has the glowing effect applied to it.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        if the give item has the glowing effect applied to it.
